title: Will Nautilus be Considered for the Divers Class Update?
body: Cuz... ya know...  He, hes a diver. Blub blub blub.

replies.body: I don't tank he will, I think he's got knots of potential uses at the moment, and he'd really weigh down the update for all the others.
You really hooked me into this thread. Your comment is the anchor of the conversation that keeps us all on deck. Let's make sure this thread doesn't end up underwater!

http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-DaXrGxJNgk4/UnmmhLssJiI/AAAAAAAAA-A/B44yI7nVqv4/s1600/toucan%20pun.png

https://media.makeameme.org/created/your-pun-is.jpg

http://i.imgur.com/kmZtmxP.jpg
http://wildammo.com/wp-content/uploads/2012/08/animal-puns-wildammo-2.jpg
I think you guys are just pun-ishing us.
I sea what you did there and your approval gives me a ray of hope, maybe we will find champions as suitable for the dive as Nauti is
This ship is sinking faster then Riven x Shyvana
For a ship to be sinking it would have had to float in the first place. :^)
This ship is sinking faster than EzrealxShyvana
Sinking? It never left the shipyard to begin with.
that' s the point, it is sinking even on solid ground
That... still makes no sense.
exactly. now tell me again, how much sense makes Ezreal kissing Shyvana' s leg?

Ooooh... I remember that.

Well, whenever it makes sense or not depends on whenever Ezreal has a leg fetish or not.

*Looks at title*

No, but he would definitely be in the Vanguard update, which has just as much chance as Divers to be next

*Sees it's in Memes & Games*

... oh,  I get it now  .__.

 http://www.jokideo.com/wp-content/uploads/2014/11/Reaction-pictures-joke-over-my-head.jpg
http://i.imgur.com/kokXSgH.gif
I was really hoping for the lines to form a dickbutt.
Found the 9gager.
They're not quite hard to spot this way, are they?
Good for you, I needed the blub, blub to get it.

Nah, he's more of a sinker, sorry to Dredge that Line up. He was taken by the Riptide and now seeks a Titan's Wrath upon those that left him. Why are you so insensitive? Mentioning diving is a Staggering Blow to his psyche.

yeah, all that trauma just weighs him down...

or is that the anchor?
http://imgur.com/4Fg158p

still need to watch that show

im told i WILL cry
Which show?

Plastic Memories is an anime that sends the feels.

My brother told me he cried

You mispelled "Spice and Wolf" and "Utawarerumono".

Honorable non-anime mention: Katawa Shoujo.

K, don't get me wrong, I LOVE S&W. Probably one of my favorite animes ever, but, i read the LN and it's so much better. But i read it in Holo and Lawrence's voices and i can hear the music sometimes. I love that novel/story. My girlfriend bought me Volume 1 for our anniversery :3

never seen utawarenwhatitsface. Or even heard of it.

Katawa shouju, Hanako best girl

>never seen utawarenwhatitsface. Or even heard of it.

Three visual novels and - currently - two anime "seasons". 

\* There were made by different studios and there is no continuity between them, since the first anime skips one very important event, so... yeah.

Played the first game and watched both animes.
The first game and the anime adaptation of it do send the feels.

>Katawa shouju, Hanako best girl

\#TeamHanako
http://i0.kym-cdn.com/photos/images/newsfeed/000/555/519/7ec.gif

Now if you excuse me...

Ivegottagodosomething!
DO IT.
I am watching Shinsekai Yori atm, but im getting kinda tired of it because the plot has changed 3 times.... with 2 major time leaps
The only thing Nautilus needs is a nerf to his CC.
what is a diver without his hook though?

why u got to take alll the bad puns?

wait u didnt

cause if you did, i would naut be happy
That was rather nautty of you

I WILL PLAY COMPETITIVE OVERWATCH FOR THE REST OF MY LIFE
but what if they do good?
